about_the_game:
Story


Embark on an otherworldly adventure in 'My Boyfriend is a Martian,' a visual novel that combines stunning artwork with a gripping storyline. Join Katie, an ordinary girl with an extraordinary love life, as she navigates the complexities of interstellar romance. As the tale unfolds, immerse yourself in lush landscapes and meet intriguing characters from distant planets. Will Katie's heart be conquered by her extraterrestrial paramour?

Features


  • Sensual Scenarios: Indulge in titillating encounters and steamy moments as Katie navigates the pleasures and pitfalls of dating a Martian. With tantalizing scenes that'll leave you blushing and laughing in equal measure, "My Boyfriend is a Martian" promises an unforgettable journey of pleasure and enjoyment.

  • Interstellar Intimacy: Explore the depths of intimacy as Katie's relationship with her Martian beau blossoms, experience a love that transcends planetary boundaries.

  • Satisfaction: Whether you're seeking laughter, romance, or a bit of both, "My Boyfriend is a Martian" offers a delightful blend of gratifying moments of enjoyment.

  • Visually Stunning Scenes: Immerse yourself in breathtaking artwork that captures the beauty and wonder, every scene is a visual feast designed to enhance your enjoyment of Katie's cosmic escapades.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
The game contains sexual content: sexual caracters, sexual acts.
It does not contains sexual violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meet Katy, your average small-town gal. After a grueling day at work, she's just trying to make it back home. Little does she know, the universe has some surprises in store for her during her long journey. Get ready for an adventure that's out of this world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
